dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1363 IH: No Hungry Kids Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. King of Iowa (for himself and Mr. Huelskamp) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To repeal a certain rule relating to nutrition standards in the national school lunch and school breakfast programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Hungry Kids Act.

The rule prescribed by the Food and Nutrition Service of the Department of Agriculture relating to nutrition standards in the national school lunch and school breakfast programs published on January 26, 2012 (77 Fed. Reg. 4088 et seq.), and revising parts 210 and 220 of title 7, Code of Federal Regulations, shall have no force or effect.

Section 9(a)(1)(A)(i) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1758(a)(1)(A)(i)) is amended by inserting before the semicolon the following: , to establish a calorie maximum for individual school lunches, or to prohibit a child from eating a lunch provided by the childâ€™s parent or legal guardian.
